sentences.en: Ethnic Composition: Hutu ( Buntu ) - 85 %; Tutsi ( Hamitic ) - 14 % ; Twa ( Pygmy ) －1 %. There is also about 5,000 Europeans and South Asians.
sentences.cn: 民族: 胡图族 占 85%, 图西族占14%,特瓦族占1%, 另有5000名欧洲人和南亚人.

sentences.en: Pygmy flying squirrel western cowboy adventure in mind.
sentences.cn: 牛仔小飞鼠西部冒险记.

sentences.en: Reaching a maximum height of 56cm the pygmy goat is essentially a pet.
sentences.cn: 因为最高仅为56厘米，这种矮种山羊基本上作为宠物来养。

sentences.en: The animals in effect became pygmy elephants.
sentences.cn: 而结果,这些象群成了今天的矮象.

sentences.en: Until now, babbling had been observed only in humans and a few primates pygmy marmosets.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止牙牙学语只在人类和一些灵长类动物中发现过.

trans.tran_cn: 俾格米人，特别矮小的人或动物，特别小的东西
trans.tran_en: someone who belongs to a race of very small people, especially one of the tribes of central Africa
